duties_responsibilities.duty: Craft user experiences using user-centered design methods from concept to execution.
Collaborate with design partners to evolve the Google design language and build innovative products.
Mature and evolve the framework concept across Google products by collaborating with other leads.
Define, maintain, and evolve tools, processes, and communication around asset management.
Explore concept development to influence product and visual style.
Partner with visual programs to evolve and apply new design styles and aesthetics for product suite.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
